summary: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking Task Force emails United Airlines Corporate Security to serve a subpoena for records, requesting expedited service by February 7, 2020, and asking that the subscriber not be notified due to the sensitive nature of the child exploitation/human trafficking investigation.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking
persons.context: The FBI agent who sent the email to United Airlines Corporate Security to serve a subpoena related to a child exploitation/human trafficking investigation.

events.title: Subpoena issued to United Airlines
events.description: A subpoena was issued to United Airlines Corporate Security, attached to the email.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking

events.title: Subpoena response due date
events.description: The subpoena has an expedited due date of February 7, 2020, for United Airlines to provide the requested records.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking

keyFacts: The FBI served a subpoena to United Airlines Corporate Security as part of a child exploitation/human trafficking investigation.
The subpoena had an expedited due date of February 7, 2020, indicating urgency in the investigation.
The FBI requested that United Airlines not notify the subscriber due to the sensitive nature of the investigation.
The correspondence is from the FBI New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking Task Force.
